mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( goods_url, goods_sn, goods_name, cat, goods_number, goods_weight, shop_price, goods_desc, goods_img, params, standard_value, cds_number, development_unit, updated_time, created_time) VALUES ( #{goodsUrl}, #{goodsSn}, #{goodsName}, #{cat}, #{goodsNumber}, #{goodsWeight}, #{shopPrice}, #{goodsDesc}, #{goodsImg}, #{params}, #{standardValue}, #{cdsNumber}, #{developmentUnit}, #{updatedTime}, now() )
mapper.update:
UPDATE product
cat = #{cat},
goods_number = #{goodsNumber},
goods_weight = #{goodsWeight},
shop_price = #{shopPrice},
goods_desc = #{goodsDesc},
goods_img = #{goodsImg},
params = #{params},
standard_value = #{standardValue},
cds_number = #{cdsNumber},
development_unit = #{developmentUnit},
updated_time = #{updatedTime}
WHERE goods_url = #{goodsUrl}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${tableName} ( goods_url, goods_sn, goods_name, cat, goods_number, goods_weight, shop_price, goods_desc, goods_img, params, standard_value, cds_number, development_unit, updated_time, created_time) VALUES ( #{product.goodsUrl}, #{product.goodsSn}, #{product.goodsName}, #{product.cat}, #{product.goodsNumber}, #{product.goodsWeight}, #{product.shopPrice}, #{product.goodsDesc}, #{product.goodsImg}, #{product.params}, #{product.standardValue}, #{product.cdsNumber}, #{product.developmentUnit}, #{product.updatedTime}, now() )

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_ichemistry ( goods_url, goods_sn, goods_name, goods_english_name, goods_alias, cat, goods_number, goods_weight, shop_price, goods_desc, goods_img, params, standard_value, cds_number, cas_number, development_unit, molecular_structure, molecular_formula, molecular_weight, updated_time, created_time) VALUES ( #{product.goodsUrl}, #{product.goodsSn}, #{product.goodsName}, #{product.goodsEnglishName}, #{product.goodsAlias}, #{product.cat}, #{product.goodsNumber}, #{product.goodsWeight}, #{product.shopPrice}, #{product.goodsDesc}, #{product.goodsImg}, #{product.params}, #{product.standardValue}, #{product.cdsNumber}, #{product.casNumber}, #{product.developmentUnit}, #{product.molecularStructure}, #{product.molecularFormula}, #{product.molecularWeight}, #{product.updatedTime}, now() )

goods_weight = #{product.goodsWeight},

updated_time = #{product.updatedTime}
WHERE goods_url = #{product.goodsUrl}
